languages.text: "Провидцы — не тот узник, которого легко сдержать. Какими бы способами Темные не обуздывали могущество моих сородичей, эти... средства будут заметны. Я найду к ним тропу".
"Farseers are not easy captives to keep. Whatever the Dark Ones are using to repress my kin's powers, those... tools will be noticeable. I will find a way to them."
languages.original_text: "Провидцы — не тот узник, которого легко сдержать. Какими бы способами Темные не обуздывали могущество моих сородичей, эти... средства будут заметны. Я найду к ним тропу".

traits.locale_text: "Farseers are not easy captives to keep. Whatever the Dark Ones are using to repress my kin's powers, those... tools will be noticeable. I will find a way to them."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les Grands Prophètes ne sont pas des prisonniers faciles à garder. Quels que soient les moyens utilisés par les Drukharis pour réprimer les pouvoirs des miens, ces... outils ne passeront pas inaperçus. Je trouverai un moyen. »
languages.original_text: "Farseers are not easy captives to keep. Whatever the Dark Ones are using to repress my kin's powers, those... tools will be noticeable. I will find a way to them."

traits.locale_text: « Les Grands Prophètes ne sont pas des prisonniers faciles à garder. Quels que soient les moyens utilisés par les Drukharis pour réprimer les pouvoirs des miens, ces... outils ne passeront pas inaperçus. Je trouverai un moyen. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “先知没那么容易被囚禁起来。无论那些黑暗子嗣用什么手段压制我那些族人的力量，那些……工具都会非常明显。我会想办法找到他们。”
languages.original_text: "Farseers are not easy captives to keep. Whatever the Dark Ones are using to repress my kin's powers, those... tools will be noticeable. I will find a way to them."

traits.locale_text: “先知没那么容易被囚禁起来。无论那些黑暗子嗣用什么手段压制我那些族人的力量，那些……工具都会非常明显。我会想办法找到他们。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「先見司を捕らえるのは容易ではない。暗黒の者たちが我が血族の力を抑えるために何を使おうとも、その道具は…目立つだろう。我が方法を探す」
languages.original_text: "Farseers are not easy captives to keep. Whatever the Dark Ones are using to repress my kin's powers, those... tools will be noticeable. I will find a way to them."

traits.locale_text: 「先見司を捕らえるのは容易ではない。暗黒の者たちが我が血族の力を抑えるために何を使おうとも、その道具は…目立つだろう。我が方法を探す」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Runenpropheten sind keine einfachen Gefangenen. Was auch immer die Dunklen einsetzen, um die Kräfte der Runenpropheten zu unterdrücken, diese ... Werkzeuge werden auffallen. Ich werde einen Weg zu ihnen finden."
languages.original_text: "Farseers are not easy captives to keep. Whatever the Dark Ones are using to repress my kin's powers, those... tools will be noticeable. I will find a way to them."

traits.locale_text: "Runenpropheten sind keine einfachen Gefangenen. Was auch immer die Dunklen einsetzen, um die Kräfte der Runenpropheten zu unterdrücken, diese ... Werkzeuge werden auffallen. Ich werde einen Weg zu ihnen finden."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No es fácil mantener cautivo a un vidente. Ignoro qué estarán utilizando los Oscuros para suprimir los poderes de mis congéneres, pero esas... herramientas serán sin duda llamativas. Daré con ellos».
languages.original_text: "Farseers are not easy captives to keep. Whatever the Dark Ones are using to repress my kin's powers, those... tools will be noticeable. I will find a way to them."

traits.locale_text: «No es fácil mantener cautivo a un vidente. Ignoro qué estarán utilizando los Oscuros para suprimir los poderes de mis congéneres, pero esas... herramientas serán sin duda llamativas. Daré con ellos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ötesezenler, kolayca hapis tutulacak tutsaklar değildir. Karalar, soydaşlarımın güçlerini bastırmak için her ne yapıyorsa bu gereçler kolayca fark edilebilir olmalı. Onları bulacağım."
languages.original_text: "Farseers are not easy captives to keep. Whatever the Dark Ones are using to repress my kin's powers, those... tools will be noticeable. I will find a way to them."

traits.locale_text: "Ötesezenler kolayca hapis tutulacak tutsaklar değildirler. Karalar soydaşlarımın güçlerini bastırmak için her ne yapıyorsa, bu gereçler kolayca fark edilebilir olmalı. Onları bulacağım."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
